title: Bought a champ with RP and it didnt got unlocked
body: i know u shouldnt buy a champ with Rp but yea, when i bought it it didnt unlock the champ HELP!

replies.body: Well, that's definitely no good! It looks like Jinx was the champion you were buying? Go ahead and double check your collection for her now! Sometimes those champs are a little slower than usual -_-'
